thread.title: Broadwind Announces Earnings Release Date and Investor Conference Participation

author: cnbc.com
title: Broadwind Announces Earnings Release Date and Investor Conference Participation
text:
CICERO, Ill., April 23, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Broadwind Energy, Inc. (NASDAQ:BWEN) will announce first quarter 2018 results on Friday, May 4, 2018 before market open. An investor conference call will follow at 10 a.m. Central time. For real-time internet access to the conference call, visit investors.bwen.com/investors/events-and-presentations . An archived replay of the conference call will be available on the Company's website shortly after the call concludes.
Broadwind also announced today that Stephanie Kushner, President and CEO, and Jason Bonfigt, Vice President and CFO, will be attending the Oppenheimer Emerging Growth Conference in New York on May 15, 2018. Management will be available for one-on-one meetings with investors attending the conference. A link to the presentation slides will be available on the investor page of the Broadwind Energy website at http://investors.bwen.com/investors/default.aspx .
About Broadwind Energy, Inc.
Broadwind Energy (NASDAQ:BWEN) is a precision manufacturer of structures, equipment and components for clean tech and other specialized applications.
